European countries by population, 2018

**List of European countries by population** present the list of 50 countries
and 8 territories and dependencies located in [Europe](/wiki/Europe "Europe").
Transcontinental countries are included if they are members of the [Council of
Europe](/wiki/Council_of_Europe "Council of Europe").

The most populated country wholly within [Europe](/wiki/Europe "Europe") is
[Germany](/wiki/Germany "Germany"). The largest city by total area is
[Paris](/wiki/Paris "Paris"). The most spoken languages are
[English](/wiki/English_language "English language"),
[German](/wiki/German_language "German language"),
[Russian](/wiki/Russian_language "Russian language"),
[French](/wiki/French_language "French language"),
[Turkish](/wiki/Turkish_language "Turkish language"),
[Italian](/wiki/Italian_language "Italian language"),
[Spanish](/wiki/Spanish_language "Spanish language"),
[Ukrainian](/wiki/Ukrainian_language "Ukrainian language") and
[Polish](/wiki/Polish_language "Polish language").
